ygData.subject: Re: bandages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes. But those are the reason I d specialise in something :) Apart from Evocation or Alteration, I can t see anything else that warrant the specialisation
ygData.messageBody:
According to Sergey Bukhman:
> > 1st choice: Speciqlise in nukes
> > 2nd choice: Specialise in root/enstill
> > 3rd choice: Specialise in shadow step+gate :)
>
> You second and third choices use the same skill - alteration.

Yes. But those are the reason I'd specialise in something :)
Apart from Evocation or Alteration, I can't see anything else that
warrant the specialisation over 50.

Now, picking one over the other is a matter of taste. Specialise in
nukes is tempting, but I think that an alteration specialisation might
be more profitable if one does solo a lot, or travel a lot.
--
